Issue.creator: wlahti
Issue.summary: Update integration test gossip parameters in core_template to be consistent with sampleconfig
Issue.description: In light of the recent change for the private data pull retry threshold parameter for integration tests, it highlighted the fact that our integration tests and sample config have widely different values for at least some of the gossip parameters. This task will align the values since the integration tests seem like a good place to help us determine if some of the parameters in the sample config are set to reasonable values.
